title: 12/21/20 HOUR 2- Andy Staples
itunes:title: 12/21/20 HOUR 2- Andy Staples
description:
Andy Staples tells Dan that there should be 8 teams in the college playoff. Andy says that every year the committee shows us that there should be an 8 team playoff.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
